酸化ヒ素: (さんかヒそ) - arsenic trioxide/white arsenic (As2O3); arsenic pentoxide (As2O5)
酸化マグネシウム: (さんかマグネシウム) - magnesium oxide (MgO); magnesia
酸化剤: (さんかざい) - oxidizing agent; oxidant; oxidizer

酸化炭素: (さんかたんそ) - carbon oxide; hypercapnia/hypercarbia/hypocapnia
酸化的リン酸化: (さんかてきリンさんか) - oxidative phosphorylation
酸化的燐酸化: (さんかてきりんさんか) - oxidative phosphorylation
酸化砒素: (さんかひそ) - arsenic trioxide/white arsenic (As2O3); arsenic pentoxide (As2O5)
酸化窒素: (さんかちっそ) - nitrogen oxide (esp. nitric oxide, but also nitrous oxide, nitrogen dioxide, dinitrogen pentoxide, etc.)
酸化還元反応: (さんかかんげんはんのう) - oxidation-reduction reaction
酸化還元酵素: (さんかかんげんこうそ) - oxidoreductase
酸化銅: (さんかどう) - copper oxide (i.e. cuprous oxide, cupric oxide)
酸化錫: (さんかすず) - stannous oxide (SnO); stannic oxide (SnO2)
酸塊: (スグリ) - gooseberry/currant; plants from the Ribes genus
酸塩基平衡: (さんえんきへいこう) - acid-base equilibrium
酸塩基指示薬: (さんえんきしじやく) - acid-base indicator
酸性反応: (さんせいはんのう) - acid reaction
酸性土壌: (さんせいどじょう) - acid soil
酸性染料: (さんせいせんりょう) - acid dye
酸性肥料: (さんせいひりょう) - acid fertilizer; acid fertiliser
酸性酸化物: (さんせいさんかぶつ) - acidic oxide
酸性食品: (さんせいしょくひん) - acid(ic) foods
酸桃: (スモモ) - Japanese plum (Prunus salicina); Chinese plum
酸模: (すかんぽ) - garden (cock) sorrel; sour dock
酸橘: (スダチ) - sudachi (species of Japanese citrus, Citrus sudachi)
酸欠: (さんけつ) - lack of oxygen; oxygen deprivation; suffocation
酸洗: (さんせん) - pickling; soaking a metal in an acidic solution to remove impurities
酸漿: (ホオズキ) - ground cherry (Physalis alkekengi var. franchetii); husk tomato; Chinese lantern plant
酸漿草: (カタバミ) - (酢漿草, 酸漿草, 鳩酸草, 酢母草 only)  creeping woodsorrel (Oxalis corniculata); family crest shaped like creeping woodsorrel
酸漿貝: (ホオズキガイ) - lampshell (excluding the lingulate brachiopods); lamp shell
酸素アセチレン炎: (さんそアセチレンえん) - oxyacetylene flame
酸素供給: (さんそきょうきゅう) - oxygen supply
酸素処理: (さんそしょり) - (induced) oxygenation; treatment with oxygen
酸素吸入: (さんそきゅうにゅう) - oxygen inhalation
酸素族元素: (さんそぞくげんそ) - oxygen family element; chalcogen
酸素欠乏: (さんそけつぼう) - oxygen deficiency; anoxia; hypoxia
酸素透過率: (さんそとうかりつ) - oxygen transmission rate; OTR
酸辣湯: (スアンラータン) - hot and sour soup (chi: suān là tāng)
酸鼻: (さんび) - appalling; awful; extreme pain; deep sorrow
醂す: (あわす) - to remove the astringent taste from persimmons; (さわす only) to soak in water/to steep in water; (さわす only) to matte (with black lacquer)
醇化: (じゅんか) - persuading by heavy-handed methods; (in aesthetics) refinement/purification/elimination of non-essential elements
醇朴: (じゅんぼく) - rustic simplicity; homeliness; unsophisticated; naive; honest; simple
醇風美俗: (じゅんぷうびぞく) - (yoji) good morals and manners; genial manners and laudable customs; pristine way of life
醋橘: (スダチ) - sudachi (species of Japanese citrus, Citrus sudachi)
醍醐: (だいご) - ghee (held to be the greatest of all flavours); the ultimate truth of Buddhism; nirvana
醍醐味: (だいごみ) - the real pleasure (of something)/the real thrill/the true charm; flavour of ghee/delicious taste; Buddha's gracious teachings
醒ます: (さます) - to awaken; to disabuse; to sober up; (醒ます only)  to dampen/to throw a damper on/to spoil
醒めやらぬ: (さめやらぬ) - lingering (usu. feeling, emotion, etc.); continuing (to); still (...)
醒める: (さめる) - to wake/to wake up; to become sober/to sober up/to regain consciousness (e.g. after anaesthesia); to come to one's senses/to be disillusioned
醒め遣らぬ: (さめやらぬ) - lingering (usu. feeling, emotion, etc.); continuing (to); still (...)
醒覚: (せいかく) - awakening; waking up; opening one's eyes
醜い: (minikui) - feio, pouco atraente; desagradável à vista, indecoroso
醜い争い: (みにくいあらそい) - scandalous dispute
醜の御楯: (しこのみたて) - the humble shield of our Sovereign Lord
